name: Astro War
description:
Defeat a belligerent alien attack that floods your planet with meteorites !

Between each wave, destroy the mothership wich control it.

You can upgrade your canon by hiting the differents ship who cross the screen.

This game is inspired by one of my favorite hit on the Mattel Intellivision : AstroMash

I have done it on vector mode like games we can find on the Vectrex Portable Game Computer.

No pictures were used for this project (except for ED logo)
